column3: 1. Select the technology that you have used the most from the list below
column4: 2. Select the category that you most use your phone for. You may select more than one.
column5: Who do you believe should be most responsible for the spread of biased or incorrect content on Facebook's news feed?
column6: 4. Please indicate how much you agree or disagree with the statement: I am comfortable with the use of emerging technologies (Chatbots, RoboAdvisors or VR etc.)
column7: 5. Please indicate how much you agree or disagree with the statement: Chatbots are likely to be more efficient than human beings in responding to customer service complaints
column8: 6. Please indicate how much you agree or disagree with the statement: I am likely to consider an investment opportunity recommended by  an algorithm
column9: 7. Please indicate how much you agree or disagree with the statement: I am afraid that emerging technologies (Chatbots, self driving cars, Robo Advisors) are going to replace the need for humans in places of employment
column10: 8. In March 2018, a woman was hit and killed by a self driving car. What do you view as the most appropriate next step?
column11: 9. Which emerging technology has been the most useful to you
column12: 10. Would you trust emerging technologies (Robo advisors, chatbots, self driving cars) enough to include them in your personal life, and why?

column4: Social media (Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn,Snap, etc), Health tracker, Messaging apps (Whatsapp, Wechat, e.t.c.), Web browsing, Entertainment (music, video, gaming)

column12: Maybe in future, I will trust these emerging technologies, but now I think the techniques are not good enough

column4: Social media (Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn,Snap, etc), Daily Planner, Messaging apps (Whatsapp, Wechat, e.t.c.), Navigation

column11: Smart speakers have been the most useful emerging tachnology because it allows me to multi task more efficiently. It allows me to browse the web in a sense, look up references, check out current events, shop or call a cab and provide entertainment just by voice commands allowing to also other tasks at the same time.
column12: I trust emerging technologies to use them to some extent in my life as I believe that using tech in the right amounts can make me more efficient. I would not use technology that is being provided as a service like a chatbot as much as I would use technology that I can buy and own like a product (drones, wearables, self-driving cars, etc)
